meanings.definition: The bone forming the front part of the rib cage, to which the ribs are attached.
meanings.sent1: The breastbone protects the heart and lungs.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often check the breastbone for any abnormalities during a physical exam.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy knight accidentally bumped his breastbone on the low doorway.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the breastbone of her success.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ball hitting the breastbone echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: The breastbone is also known as the sternum.
meanings.sent1: The sternum, or breastbone, connects the ribs in the front of the body.
meanings.sent2: In anatomy class, students learn about the breastbone and its functions.
meanings.sent3: The archaeologist found a rare artifact buried beneath the breastbone of the skeleton.
meanings.sent4: His honesty was the breastbone of his reputation in the community.
meanings.sent5: The symbol carved into the breastbone of the statue held a mysterious meaning.
